fields.name: Subalignment:
fields.value: Power, Killing, Investigative, Protective, Support, Casual, Conversion

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Only one X Power, one X Casual, and one X Conversion may spawn, and only two of the three may spawn
- Factional chat
- Factional kill
- X Conversion roles cannot convert if there are 4 or more members.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Reestablish your control over the town and eliminate those not worthy to control it.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Reestablish your control over the town and eliminate those not worthy to control it.
